Example:
Name: Crystalborn
Group: Crystalborn
Ability: CON +2, WIS +1
Size: Medium
Speed: 30
Languages: Common, Terran
Traits:
Shardlight: You can cast the guidance cantrip.

Name: Crystalborn (Ember)
Ability: STR +1
Traits:
Ember Shield: You gain resistance to fire damage.
